items.body: Fabulous. Perfect for a light coat!!! I have gotten so many compliments on it and now i want it in brown!!! I'm obsessed with the Y2k looks coming back ðŸ˜ Read more

items.body: Exactly as described. Yes the fur looks cheap but just style correctly and it completely meets the assignment Read more
items.author: Christina

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars The fur on sweater looked gross!
items.body: Not pleased at all, made very cheap! Fur on this sweater looked nothing like picture! Read more
items.author: Colleen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Cute!
items.body: This is really cute! I love that itâ€™s not bulky and shapes well to the body. Itâ€™s thin, which at first I thought would be a problem, but thatâ€™s how it keeps its shape. If it were thicker, it would be frumpy on me. Itâ€™s pretty long (Iâ€™m 5â€™7), so itâ€™s the perfect length for me, below the knee. It is thin, so itâ€™s more for a look than for warmth. Itâ€™s well made, but I donâ€™t see it lasting forever. The faux fur is super cute! Canâ€™t wait to wear it out. Read more
items.author: Cheri H.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but THIN and cheaply made, runs small!
items.body: I haven't fully decided if I intend to return this item or not. It is cute on. But I do feel like anyone considering purchasing needs to have the following information that I did not have when I purchased. (1) This item is very thin!! This is not a jacket, coat or sweater. This is a thin blouse that happens to be long with fur on the collar and around the sleeve cuffs. That's it. Do not buy this to wear in temps below 60, you will be cold. (2) this item runs small. I bought a Medium and it fits like a small. Having said that, when I am wearing it, it's cute. It's just not the best quality and reminds me of something I'd receive from Temu or Shein. Do with this info what you will. I wish I'd had it before I purchased. Read more
items.author: Sandi Posey

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Like the fit
items.body: Looks good and fits well but material is kind of thin. Overall like the fit though Read more
items.author: Dionne

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pure Black, Pure White, Solid Brown, Pure Burgundy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
